query:
SELECT 
  u.id as userId,
  u.email as userEmail,
  j.id as jobId,
  j.customerId as jobCustomerId,
  j.customerEmail as jobCustomerEmail,
  j.status
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN jobs j ON (j.customerId = u.id OR j.customerEmail = u.email)
WHERE u.email = '12@customer.com';
